availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: W. Stanford McFarland (Daviess County, Kentucky, attorney)

body.p: Daviess County, Kentucky, attorney. Kentucky native. Married to Mary Ann Carothers McFarland. Law student in Daviess County in 1860. Attorney in Daviess County in 1863. County attorney for Daviess County in 1865.

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedule, Kentucky, Daviess County, District 2, p. 18; Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records (Provost Marshal General's Bureau; Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865), NARA RG 110, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865 (Civil War Union Draft Records), Daviess County, KY, June 1863, p. 334, (Accessed via ancestry.com); Find A Grave, "W. Stanford McFarland" (1839-1911)," Memorial #28823503, http://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=28823503&ref=acom (accessed May 2, 2017).
